item.title: Jenny Slate, Kaitlyn Dever and Issa Rae Set for Chanel and Tribeca’s Through Her Lens Jury
item.description: The 10th edition of the artist development initiative will also feature Meghann Fahy, Allison Janney, Sarah Paulson, Pamela Abdy and Lucy Liu.
